type.description:
### ⚠️ Requires [Apugli](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/) to be installed! ⚠️

## Modify Soul Speed

---


[Power Type](https://apugli.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/power_types/modify_soul_speed).

Modifies the amount of Soul Speed levels of an entity.

Type ID: `apugli:modify_soul_speed`

---

### Example
```json
{
    "type": "apugli:modify_soul_speed",
    "modifier": {
        "operation": "addition",
        "value": 1
    },
    "condition": {
        "type": "apoli:enchantment",
        "enchantment": "minecraft:soul_speed",
        "calculation": "max",
        "comparison": "=",
        "compare_to": 0
    }
}
```
This power adds 1 level of Soul Speed to an entity if the entity is wearing equipment without the Soul Speed enchantment.

modifier.description: If set, this modifier will apply to the entity's amount of Soul Speed.
modifier.markdownDescription: If set, this modifier will apply to the entity's amount of Soul Speed.

modifiers.description: If set, these modifiers will apply to the entity's amount of Soul Speed.

block_condition.description: If set, this will determine what blocks the soul speed effect will activate on.

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Modify Soul Speed (Power Type) date: 2021-08-19

Modify Soul Speed

Power Type.

Modifies the amount of Soul Speed levels of an entity.

Type ID: apugli:modify_soul_speed

Fields

Field Type Default Description
modifier Attribute Modifier optional If set, this modifier will apply to the entity's amount of Soul Speed.
modifiers Array of Attribute Modifiers optional If set, these modifiers will apply to the entity's amount of Soul Speed.
block_condition Block Condition Type optional If set, this will determine what blocks the soul speed effect will activate on.

Example

{
    "type": "apugli:modify_soul_speed",
    "modifier": {
        "operation": "addition",
        "value": 1
    },
    "condition": {
        "type": "apoli:enchantment",
        "enchantment": "minecraft:soul_speed",
        "calculation": "max",
        "comparison": "=",
        "compare_to": 0
    }
}

This power adds 1 level of Soul Speed to an entity if the entity is wearing equipment without the Soul Speed enchantment.
